task.title: Training
task.shortdesc: Your cat can perform tricks for a treat.

context.p: Cats can be trained through positive conditioning. Follow these steps to teach your cat how to follow you to the kitchen.

step.cmd: Snap your fingers while performing step 1.
Snap your fingers at another time as you go to the kitchen.

taskbody.postreq: Now observe your cat follow you to the kitchen whenever you snap your fingers.
